name: Lucifers Last Redemption
description:
Welcome to "Lucifer's Last Redemption".

A free top-down twin stick shooter based on a highscore system, where you have to protect the souls as Lucifer that are being dragged down to hell by demons. Save them by shooting down the hellish creatures to secure their way to heaven and restore the earth.

Set new highscores to compete with your friends and send the demons back to where they belong!

For concepts, development insights, and more visit us on:

https://www.instagram.com/luciferslastredemption/

https://twitter.com/LucifersLR

The passionate team behind "Lucifer's Last Redemption": 

Dmitry Samokhin - 3D / Lighting / VFX Artist

Gina Jaeschke - UI / 2D / 3D Artist

Leon von Rabenau - 2D / Texture Artist / Sound Designer

Peter Brockhammer - Art Director / 2D / Texture Artist

Changai Batbajar - Producer / Animator

Marco Eberhardt - Engineer

Nicholas Taprogge - Game Design / Engineer

Naima Baskaraca - 2D / VFX Artist

S4G School for Games GmbH Official website
